sentences.sContent: American English is significantly different from British English.
sentences.sCn: 美国英语与英国英语有很大差异。

sentences.sContent: There are many different types of fabric.
I looked it up in three different dictionaries.
sentences.sCn: 我分别在三本词典里查找过。

sentences.sContent: They are sold in many different colours.
sentences.sCn: 这些有多种颜色供选购。

sentences.sContent: ...The different shapes of the containers effectively they were used to brew...
...scientists are increasingly learning that aging and biological age are two different things...
...Different students may prefer different types of exams...
...That people often experience trouble sleeping in a different bed in unfamiliar surroundings is a phenomenon known as the first-night effect...
...He says he must grow different kinds of tea if he is to survive...
...People are different in other parts of the country...
...people who are standing at the crossroads may have different ideas...
...is the ability to make idea-producing connections by linking concepts from different disciplines...
...are the effects of thinking about time in these different ways...
...they had participants organize different activities-from project planning...

synos.tran: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

phrases.pCn: 以不同方式；用不同的方法；通过不同的方式
种类(或性质、本质)不同处
